title: 62: The Too Hot to Cook Episode
itunes:title: The Too Hot to Cook Episode
description: Is it hot enough for ya? You’ve come to the right place! In this episode, Lisa shares her best NO-COOK tips and tricks so you don’t have to fire up that oven or grill! Tips like fridge & freezer staples and the best precooked proteins. Plus, the gang "CHEW & TELLS" nine new products, and some are really BIG hits! So don’t go anywhere near that stove, because this episode is all about keeping you cool in the kitchen! And don’t forget to head over to our Foodcast page for all the products and recipes mentioned in the episode!
itunes:author: Lisa Lillien
dc:creator: Lisa Lillien
